description.p: InfiniPaint is a collaborative, infinite space, infinite zoom, canvas note-taking/drawing app. Unlike many other infinite canvas apps, although there is a specific zoom-in level limit, there is no zoom-out limit (at least up until the point your computer runs out of memory). This means that this app is very good at things such as drawing sketches of the solar system to scale, or just drawing any massive objects with tiny details. Of course, this app is also perfectly well suited for use as a normal canvas.

ul.li: Graphics tablet support (Pressure sensitive brush and eraser detection)
Right click to open a quick menu
Place bookmarks on the canvas to jump to later
Screenshot tool to export parts of the canvas to a picture
Other tools such as: Textbox tool, Transform tool, Color picker tool, Square and Ellipse tools
Copy and paste objects on the canvas, and between different canvases
Insert images and files on the canvas
